subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox, who finished last in 2012 and 2014 but won the 2013 World Series, hope to win again with five new players to whom they’ve committed $306.75 million.
snippet: The Red Sox, who finished last in 2012 and 2014 but won the 2013 World Series, hope to win again with five new players to whom they’ve committed $306.75 million.
